DESCRIPTION: Arcane spells are full of randomness that gives you powerful abilities.
Frost spells can limit the enemy's movements and let you dominate the fight.
Fire spells deal high damage and burn effects, but watch out the fire!
A #bFrozen creature loses his next action. NL #bFrozen effect can NOT stack.
Increase the damage and block from spell cards, or enhance other effects.
#rCombusting creatures will lose their HP at the end of turn.
Removed until end of combat. NL Does NOT go to your exhaust pile.
This card automatically plays itself when drawn.
Prevent the next time you would lose HP.
Choose 1 of 3 cards to add into your hand.
Add a number of #rBurns to your discard pile.
